content: round gusset round 2 k to 3 sts before instep k2tog k1 work next row of left sock chart for your size k1 ssk k to end of round 2 sts decrease repeat gusset rnds 1-2 in pattern 6 6 7 more times 60 65 72 sts rem continue on to foot instructions for your size ©2018 lori wagner designs davenlori98@hotmail com pattern not to be reproduced reprinted sold or knit for sale page 4 foot for 7 75 only right set up round 1 k to instep work pattern from chart or written directions across instep sts k2 m1l k to end of round 1 st increase left set up round 1 k to last 2 instep sts m1r k2 work pattern from chart or written directions across instep sts k to end of round 1 st increase all sizes work in rnds working instep in pattern until row 68 of chart is complete continue in st st until sock measures 1 5 3 8 cm less than desired foot total length from back of heel note if the sock measures 1 5 3 8 less than desired foot total length but chart is not completed stop working from the chart and begin with directions for the toe toe set-up remove end of round marker k15 16 18 to end of sole this is the new start of round at the beginning of the instep rearrange sts or place a removable marker as you prefer the first half of the sts are the instep the second half are the sole round 1 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of instep k2tog k1 start of sole k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of sole k2tog k1 4 sts decrease round 2 k repeat rnds 1 & 2 7 7 8 more times 28 34 36 sts rem work round 1 only 4 5 6 times 12 14 12 sts rem finishing cut yarn leaving a 12 30 cm tail use kitchener to graft rem sts weave in ends and block to measurements i would like to give credit to knotions magazine for originally choosing diagon ally socks to be featured in their december 2018 sock issue and their wonderful photography i would also like to thank my team for helping me test and republish my pattern to ravelry i could not have done this without this team of amazing knitters pattern testers kettavern and vitzknitz thank you so much for purchasing my pattern if you have questions please email me at davenlori98@hotmail com or contact me through ravelry under my username davenlori98 i hope you enjoyed knitting diagon ally socks if you are interested in more of my designs please visit my ravelry store at http //www ravelry com/designers/lori-wagner ©2018 lori wagner designs
